H0.text: What is the name of the German magazine which claimed in 1983 to have found Hitler's diaries. Der Spiegel

H1.text: What is the name of the German magazine which claimed in 1983 to have found Hitler's diaries. Focus

H2.text: What is the name of the German magazine which claimed in 1983 to have found Hitler's diaries. Bild

H3.text: What is the name of the German magazine which claimed in 1983 to have found Hitler's diaries. Stern

A4.text: For Stern very much more damaging publicity followed its serialisation, beginning in April 1983, of the so-called Hitler Diaries.

A5.text: Gerd Heidemann, reporter who in 1983 acquired the forged Hitler diaries for the magazine.
